did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files
1985-1986

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-2/1/2.882, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred on 1988 August 25.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These files constitute the major record series generated by the president of the University of Virginia. The records consist chiefly of correspondence, but also include reports, minutes, clippings, memoranda, and related papers concerning all areas of business of the president's office.
The papers consist of: general files, 1985-1986; seldom used permanent files, 1947-1987; and, affirmative action/equal opportunity officer search files.
Permanent records concern: Attorney General Foundation requests; civil rights compliance reports; Equal Opportunity Programs; and, Lesbian and Gay Student Union.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
Series I: General Files, 1985-1986 Boxes 1-44
Series II: Seldom Used Permanent Files, 1947-1987 Boxes 45-52
Series III: Affirmative action/Equal Opportunity Officer Search Files Boxes 53-57
Series IV: Restricted Files Box 58
